h2_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Locations
h3_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Location 12
content: The next Blood of the Iron Bull can be found by defeating the Tiger's Acolyte in Yellow Sand Formation \- Windrest Hamlet in Yellow Wind Ridge. This can be accessed by going across the bridge from the Valley of Despair Shrine in Sandgate Village.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Blood_of_the_Iron_Bull.md', within the main section titled 'Blood of the Iron Bull', specifically from the subsection 'Blood of the Iron Bull Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Blood of the Iron Bull Location 12'.
The content is as follows:
The next Blood of the Iron Bull can be found by defeating the Tiger's Acolyte in Yellow Sand Formation \- Windrest Hamlet in Yellow Wind Ridge. This can be accessed by going across the bridge from the Valley of Despair Shrine in Sandgate Village.
